title: 76616c6172
text:
Hi! I’m Nox, I write about technical topics, things that interests me, and things that I’m doing that may be of use to you.
Aspirationally — seeker of truth, pursuer of knowledge, eager student of technology. But you must be wondering, who exactly is this Nox character? What secrets does he hold? What knowledge has he yet to unlock?






Join me on this voyage of exploration!



Read my Posts.


Let’s satiate our curiosity and push the boundaries of what’s possible, together~

Let’s start with some code!
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    fmt.Println("Yo")
}
Did you like my code?









Note with Title



This is an example of a callout note with a title.


I heard in copywriting they use this technique called “call to action” intermittently to get you to do stuff. It’s very effective!







flowchart LR
  A[Hard edge] --> B(Round edge)
  B --> C{Decision}
  C --> D[Result one]
  C --> E[Result two]








Aren’t these charts cool?



inline math: \(E = mc^{2}\) \[E = mc^{2}\]
Doesn’t this math look sophisticated?




Isn’t this an absolute banger?
